fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or acceptance criteria for this epic to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning the epic

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this epic is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this epic will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: New = Not started yet; Active = work remains to be done; Resolved = awaiting acceptance tests; Closed = acceptance tests passed

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the epic is in its current state

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The date to start the task

fields.name: Original Estimate
fields.description: Initial value for Remaining Work - set once, when work begins

fields.name: Completed Work
fields.description: The number of units of work that have been spent on this bug

fields.name: Application Type
fields.description: The type of application on which to give feedback

fields.name: Application Start Information
fields.description: The path to execute the application

fields.name: Application Launch Instructions
fields.description: Instructions to launch the specified application

fields.name: Rating
fields.description: Overall rating provided as part of feedback response

fields.name: Issue
fields.description: Used to highlight the shared step, e.g., to mark it as an issue

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration for this test suite.

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product associated with this test suite.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test suite.

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the test suite.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why  the current test suite is in the current state.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently assigned to the test suite.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test suite

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this test plan will execute.

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product associated with this test plan.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test plan.

fields.name: State
fields.description: Workflow status.  Active = tests in this test plan must be run; Inactive = tests in this test plan no longer need to be run

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: Reason for the current test plan state.

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning this test plan.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test plan

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: Title
fields.description: The nature of the problem and why it is affecting or could affect the project

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Problem, resolution plan and status

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this issue

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this issue is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this issue will be fixed

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: Change to Closed when the issue is resolved or not relevant anymore

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the issue is in the current state

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or acceptance criteria for this epic to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning the epic

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this epic is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this epic will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: New = Not started yet; Active = work remains to be done; Resolved = awaiting acceptance tests; Closed = acceptance tests passed

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the epic is in its current state

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The date to start the task

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or reference to the story that must work for this work to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this story

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this user story is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this user story will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: New = Not started yet; Active = work remains to be done; Resolved = awaiting acceptance tests; Closed = acceptance tests passed

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the story is in its current state

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Short description of the test case used to differentiate it in a list or report

fields.name: State
fields.description: The workflow state of the test case

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the test case is in the current state

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this test case

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Purpose of this test; requirement tested

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread and other historical information

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this test case is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this bug will be fixed

fields.name: Title
fields.description: What the user will be able to do when this is implemented

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description or acceptance criteria for this feature to be considered complete

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently owning the feature

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this feature is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this feature will be implemented

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: New = Not started yet; Active = work remains to be done; Resolved = awaiting acceptance tests; Closed = acceptance tests passed

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the feature is in its current state

fields.name: Start Date
fields.description: The date to start the task

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Work required and how this will implement a User Story

fields.name: Description
fields.description: What to do, pointers to resources and inputs, design notes, exit criteria

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this task

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product to which this task contributes

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this task will be completed

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: New = New work not yet activated; Active = work remains to be done; Closed = tested and checked in.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the task is in its current state

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Stories affected and how

fields.name: Original Estimate
fields.description: Initial value for Remaining Work - set once, when work begins

fields.name: Completed Work
fields.description: The number of units of work that have been spent on this bug

fields.name: Assigned To
fields.description: The person currently working on this bug

fields.name: Area Path
fields.description: The area of the product with which this bug is associated

fields.name: Iteration Path
fields.description: The iteration within which this bug will be fixed

fields.name: History
fields.description: Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes

fields.name: State
fields.description: New = for triage; Active = not yet fixed; Resolved = fixed not yet verified; Closed = fix verified.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason why the bug is in the current state

fields.name: Resolved Reason
fields.description: The reason why the bug was resolved

fields.name: Stack Rank
fields.description: Work first on items with lower-valued stack rank. Set in triage.

fields.name: Value Area
fields.description: The type should be set to Business primarily to represent customer-facing issues. Work to change the architecture should be added as a User Story

workItemTypes.name: Epic
workItemTypes.description: Epics help teams effectively manage and groom their product backlog

workItemTypes.name: User Story
workItemTypes.description: Tracks an activity the user will be able to perform with the product

workItemTypes.name: Bug
workItemTypes.description: Describes a divergence between required and actual behavior, and tracks the work done to correct the defect and verify the correction.

workItemTypes.name: Test Case
workItemTypes.description: Server-side data for a set of steps to be tested.

workItemTypes.name: Feature
workItemTypes.description: Tracks a feature that will be released with the product

workItemTypes.name: Task
workItemTypes.description: Tracks work that needs to be done.

workItemTypes.name: Test Suite
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activites for a specific feature, requirement, or user story.

workItemTypes.name: Test Plan
workItemTypes.description: Tracks test activities for a specific milestone or release.
